attributes.action: Refrain from tell the people who work on the arts to retrain for a real job

rejection.details:
We understand that you are unhappy with the Government's approach regarding theatres and the arts community, but it's not clear what you want the Government to do. Additionally, theatres are already allowed to open, although there are restrictions on how they can operate.

We have published the following petitions, some of which you might like to sign:

Offer more support to the arts (particularly Theatres and Music) amidst COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320711

Extend furlough scheme for theatre and live music industry: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329174

Review need for social distancing inside theatres before November: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549630

Support the culture sector by launching a “Visit a Theatre, To Help Out” scheme: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334377
